import { useState } from 'react' import Head from 'next/head' import Link from 'next/link' import Layout from '../../components/layout' import { getAll } from '../../actions/blog' import {API} from '../../config' import renderHTML from 'react-render-html' import moment from 'moment' const Blogs = ({blogs, categories, tags, size}) => { const showAllBlog = ()=> { return blogs.map((blog,i)=> { return(

{blog.title}

Posted by {blog.author.name} | Published {moment(blog.updateAt).fromNow()}

tags,categories

image
{renderHTML(blog.exerpt)} Read more
) }) } return( <>

Hello

Categories and tag

{showAllBlog()}
) } Blogs.getInitialProps = () => { return getAll().then(data=> { if(data.error) { console.log(data.error); } else { return { blogs: data.blogs, categories: data.categories, tags: data.tags, size: data.size, } } }) } export default Blogs
